item.title: MARINE PETROLEUM TRUST 10-K
item.description: MARINE PETROLEUM TRUST, which is in the Oil Royalty Traders [6792] industry, SEC 10-K filing on August 31, 2022 had 9095 (cleaned) words - 600 were utilized for the visualizations. Top Words: marine - 203 instances trust - 199 instances oil - 117 instances gas - 114 instances natural - 106 instances See the parsed data used in the visualization here.
